GapFillInput.Title: Present perfect
GapFillInput.Instruction: Read the information about Lise, Tomas, Jim and Yvonne. Then put the verb in brackets into the Present perfect. Use the short forms.

Content.Question:
1. Lise has bought (buy) two new mobile phones this year.
2. Tomas has owned (own) three mobile phones in his life.
3. Jim and Yvonne have never had (never / have) a mobile phone.
4. Tomas has received (receive) about 150 e-mails this week.
5. Jim and Yvonne have sent (send) five e-mails today.
6. Lise hasn't sent (not / send) any e-mails today.
7. Jim and Yvonne haven't spent (not / spend) any time on the Internet this week.
8. Tomas has spent (spend) a lot of time on the Internet this week.

10. Jim and Yvonne have made (make) three phone calls today.
